description: Turning away from street protests, Black Lives Matter tries a new tactic in the age of Trump - The Washington Post
extended: Outside the Triple S Food Mart in Baton Rouge, where police shot and killed Alton Sterling, a crowd gathered Tuesday night to hold a vigil and protest the Justice Departmentâ€™s decision not to charge the officer. They held signs and gave speeches. They prayed and cried.

description: Page Not Found - The Daily Beast
extended: Dear Britain: Please stop sending us your failed media celebrities. Louise Mensch is a former chick-lit novelist, politician, and founding editor of the conservative website Heat Street.
Last year, I went to Nigeria with Mark Zuckerberg. One of the first stops on the trip was a program that taught kids how to code.
